action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can propress, atifory, alful, adcry, spidene and pnestay.

Your goal for this game is: Make the oubiced ecastic, the prachon dedulag and the mindly ropile.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a sinark now. There are a uncepist, a prachon, a ionity, a mindly, a epteria and a clednee. There is a passage to a conader here.
action.label: context
